passwordMinChars: Password must have at least 6 characters
checkEmailToConfirm: Check your email to confirm your account.
emailNotRegistered: No account is registered with this email.
recoveryEmailSent: If this email is registered, you will receive a recovery link.
recoveryEmailSentDescription: We have sent a recovery link to your email. Check your inbox and follow the instructions.
checkSpamFolder: If you don't receive the email in a few minutes, check your spam folder.
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password.
joinUsHeroTitle: Take your court to the next level
joinUsHeroSubtitle: Digitize your sports business and reach thousands of players looking for a place to play.
joinUsFeatureReservationsDesc: Your clients book online 24/7. No calls, no WhatsApp. Manage schedules, prices and availability from one place.
joinUsFeaturePaymentsDesc: Keep a clear record of every payment. Receive notifications, generate reports and reduce defaults.
joinUsFeatureClientsDesc: Know your frequent players, their preferred schedules and build relationships that generate loyalty.
joinUsFeatureMetricsDesc: Visualize your occupancy, revenue and trends. Make data-driven decisions, not assumptions.
joinUsFeatureMultifieldDesc: Manage one or a hundred courts from the same dashboard. Ideal for sports centers with multiple spaces.
joinUsFeatureStaffDesc: Assign roles and permissions to your staff. Everyone sees only what they need, without compromising security.
joinUsWhyDesc: We are the most complete sports booking platform in Latin America. We connect court owners with players looking for a place to play.
joinUsCTADesc: Contact us on WhatsApp and we'll help you set up your court in minutes.
